registration_overview.description: Morgan State University registration process for Computer Science students
registration_overview.priority_registration: Students register based on class level and credit hours completed

enrollment_pin_process.description: Academic advisors provide enrollment PINs during advising appointments
steps: Schedule advising appointment with your assigned advisor
Complete degree audit review during appointment
Discuss course selection and academic progress
Register during your assigned time slot
enrollment_pin_process.pin_validity: PINs are only valid during your assigned registration time slot
enrollment_pin_process.lost_pin_contact: Contact department office (443) 885-3130 or your advisor

registration_steps.credentials: Use your Morgan State username and password

registration_steps.description: Input the PIN provided by your academic advisor
Use course codes (e.g., COSC 111) or browse by subject
Choose specific class times and instructors
Add selected courses to your schedule
Review your complete schedule before final submission

common_registration_issues.solution: Submit override request form to department
Contact advisor to verify completion or request override
common_registration_issues.note: Must provide documentation of equivalent coursework

common_registration_issues.solution: Choose different section or contact department for options
common_registration_issues.note: System will not allow overlapping class times

common_registration_issues.limit: Standard limit is 18 credit hours per semester

schedule_changes.withdrawal_deadline: Varies by semester - check academic calendar
schedule_changes.refund_schedule: Prorated refunds based on withdrawal date

helpful_tips: Register as early as possible in your time slot for best course selection
Have backup course options ready in case preferred sections are full
Check prerequisites carefully before attempting to register
Monitor your Morgan email for registration updates and holds
Contact the Registrar's Office for technical WebSIS issues
